question:
Who among the following served as non-Indian presidents of Indian National Congress?
  1. Alfred Webb
  2. George Yule
  3. William Wedderburn
  4. Henry Cotton
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
• 1888 - George Yule
  • 1889,1910 - William Wedderburn
  • 1894 - Alfred Webb
  • 1904 - Henry Cotton
  • 1917 - Annie Besant
